complex_words.shabrack: a saddlecloth for a horse, formerly used by European light cavalry. The shabraque was an accoutrement of the hussar cavalry, based on the Hungarian horsemen
complex_words.shako: a tall, cylindrical military cap, usually with a visor, and sometimes tapered at the top. It is usually adorned with an ornamental plate or badge
complex_words.shibboleth: a group of old people standing together in consultation
